description: A pair of climbing pants purpose-built to withstand the rigors of technical climbing, whether that’s all-day multi-pitch trad ascents in Yosemite or alpine rock routes in the Cascades. The Technician Pro Alpine Pants are tough, with four-way stretch, lightweight, and protective all in one. Featuring Green Theme Technology’s Empel™ PFC-free DWR, these pants provide a level of weather resistance for mountain adventures. They also are engineered with Graphene technology—a super light fabric with superior thermal conductivity for heat regulation. In addition to the DWR and superior breathability, touch points like the articulated knees, ladder lock waist adjustment, gusseted inseams and well-placed zipper pockets make the pants our go-to technical climbing bottoms in the line-up.
name: Black Diamond Technician Pro Alpine Pants - Mens

specs.value: Four way stretch Nylon face Double weave with Graphene in yarn technology on backside, GTT Empel DWR finish - 69% Nylon, 19% Polyester, 12% Elastane, 126 g
